title: Phase 4: Complete Native Element Coverage
close_reason: Phase 4 complete: Added 31 native element style files covering multimedia, form extensions, content sectioning, text content, and inline semantics

title: 4.4 Multimedia elements (img, video, audio, iframe, canvas, svg)
description: High priority: Style img, picture, video, audio, iframe, canvas, svg with responsive patterns and variants
close_reason: Created image, video, iframe, canvas, svg styles with responsive patterns and variants

title: 4.5 Form extensions (form, progress, meter, output, datalist)
description: High priority: Style form layout, progress bars, meter gauges, output elements with variants
close_reason: Created form, progress, meter, output, datalist styles with layout patterns and variants

title: 4.1 Content sectioning (article, aside, section, header, footer, main, address, hgroup, search)
description: Structural elements with minimal base styling and variant classes for common patterns
close_reason: Created article, aside, section, header, footer, main, address, hgroup, search styles with variant classes

title: 4.3 Inline text semantics (abbr, cite, dfn, kbd, q, mark, del, ins, sub, sup, time, var, data, ruby)
description: Lower priority: Inline semantic elements for specialized text markup
close_reason: Created abbr, cite, dfn, q, del, ins, sub, sup, time, data, ruby, s, u, bdi, bdo, wbr styles with variants

title: 4.2 Text content elements (figure, figcaption, menu)
description: Figure with caption styling, menu for toolbar/context patterns
close_reason: Created figure, figcaption, menu styles with float, code, quote, toolbar, context variants
